channel.title: AI on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Ex Machina

item.title: Curiosity
item.description: There is no doubt that AI is a technology like no other and that, as a result, the disruption it is likely to cause will be unprecedented. But despite the existential fear that this has brought about, it is unlikely that it will render us irrelevant. Not so long as we continue to constantly question.
